## Bio

Hi! I'm an fourth-year undergraduate student at University of Electronic Science and Technology of China ([UESTC](https://en.uestc.edu.cn)) and University of Glasgow ([UofG](https://www.gla.ac.uk), Dual-degree Program). I majored in electronic and computer engineering (ECE). I'm a CS and math enthusiast, classical music lover. I love innovation and challenges!

**I'm looking for a PhD position in ML accelerators or AI-EDA in 2026**.
